verses.roman:
eka-dina haridāsa goṅphāte vasiyā
nāma-saṅkīrtana karena ucca kariyā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; haridāsa—Haridāsa Ṭhākura; goṅphāte vasiyā—sitting in his cave; nāma-saṅkīrtana karena—was chanting the holy name of the Lord; ucca kariyā—resounding very loudly.
translation: One day Haridāsa Ṭhākura was sitting in his cave, reciting very loudly the holy name of the Lord.
